response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds significant value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its true value and provides you with an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a favorable cost. I believe this offer presents a mutually beneficial arrangement, allowing us both to achieve our goals. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 950000}
